comments.body: Do we clean up unused entries? It would be good if we garbage collect dead indexes. It might be simpler to implement that if we store a single id for each jar entry (instead of `path, last_modified, size`), then we could cascade drop entries that are not in the last build import.
the single ID can be a concatenation or checksum of the three values
So you want me collect all Jars that are part of the build during indexing and then at the end of indexing drop the ones that aren't.
I think that would be good if we can implement it.
Unused Jars/Toplevels are removed from cache after indexing now.
